articles.description: The season featuring 29-year-old homicide suspect Ariel Robinson, of South Carolina, is no longer available for viewing on Hulu, Discovery+, YouTube, or the Food Network website.
articles.content: The Food Network has scrapped Season 20 of Worst Cooks in America after the winner of the cooking competition was charged along with her husband with battering to death their adopted three-year-old d… [+3263 chars]

articles.title: WandaVision Fans Spot Hilarious Goof In The Latest Episode - We Got This Covered
articles.description: WandaVision fans have spotted a hilarious goof involving Paul Bettany's arm in the Marvel show's latest episode.

articles.title: The Sundance Film Festival makes a giant leap into VR - Engadget
articles.description: Anyone can access Sundance's VR platform by picking up a $25 Explorer Pass (or one of the festival's more premium passes), and logging onto a website. It's one area I hope Sundance expands on in the future. Overall, Sundance has 14 New Frontier exhibitions th…
articles.content: Over at the New Frontier Gallery, every VR/AR/mixed media exhibition was on display like a work of art. Stepping up to an individual piece brings up an explanation as well as the requirements for vie… [+848 chars]
